commits: f81b038: feat(368): add Agent settings UI, dynamic terminal tabs, and hardcode removal
implemented_tasks: Task 4.1: AgentSettingsPane new component with checkbox UI, max 2 selection, PATCH API persistence
Task 4.2: NotesAndLogsPane extended with 'agent' sub-tab rendering AgentSettingsPane
Task 4.3: WorktreeDetailRefactored dynamic rendering - selectedAgents state, hardcode removal, activeCliTab sync
Task 4.2-i18n: i18n keys added (en/ja) for agentTab, agentSettings, selectAgents, etc.
Task 0.2: Hardcode removal in 7 API routes (send, current-output, interrupt, auto-yes, cli-tool, start-polling, messages)
Task 0.4 partial: MessageList.tsx getToolName() and AutoYesToggle.tsx formatCliToolName() replaced with getCliToolDisplayName()
message: Iteration-2 TDD implementation complete. Created AgentSettingsPane component, extended NotesAndLogsPane with Agent tab, made WorktreeDetailRefactored terminal header tabs dynamic from selectedAgents, replaced hardcoded CLI tool arrays in 7 API routes with CLI_TOOL_IDS, and unified display name functions. All 4001 unit tests pass, 0 TypeScript errors, 0 ESLint errors, build succeeds.
